title: Drawing, "Radio City Music Hall: Roxy Apartment:, Office Layout", 1932
medium: Graphite and red colored pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: 2 OFFICE DESK/2 OFFICE DESK CHAIRS/2 SOFAS/1 LOVE SEAT/6 UPH. CHAIRS/1 ROUND BACK ARM CHAIR/4 SIDE CHAIRS/2 SIDE TABLES/1 ROUD (sic) SIDE TABLE/2 WALL TABLES/2 CABINETS/1 CONSOLE/2 DESK LIGHTS/6 TABLE LIGHTS/4 FLOOR REFLECTORS; inscribed in graphite with instructions, descriptions throughout.
description: Plan and elevations for various offices in Roxy Apartment. Two offices and a sitting room with desks, sofas, upholstered chairs, tables, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Radio City Music Hall: Roxy Apartment:, Office Layout", 1932.
1932. Graphite and red colored pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-472.
